argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ordtypelem.1 | |- F = recs ( G ) |
| 2 |  | ordtypelem.2 | |- C = { w e. A | A. j e. ran h j R w } |
| 3 |  | ordtypelem.3 | |- G = ( h e. _V |-> ( iota_ v e. C A. u e. C -. u R v ) ) |
| 4 |  | ordtypelem.5 | |- T = { x e. On | E. t e. A A. z e. ( F " x ) z R t } |
| 5 |  | ordtypelem.6 | |- O = OrdIso ( R , A ) |
| 6 |  | ordtypelem.7 | |- ( ph -> R We A ) |
| 7 |  | ordtypelem.8 | |- ( ph -> R Se A ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_ordtypelem2 | |- ( ph -> Ord T ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_tfr1a | |- ( Fun F /\ Lim dom F ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simpri | |- Lim dom F |
| 11 |  | #P_limord | |- ( Lim dom F -> Ord dom F ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_ax-mp | |- Ord dom F |
| 13 |  | #P_ordin | |- ( ( Ord T /\ Ord dom F ) -> Ord ( T i^i dom F ) ) |
| 14 | 8, 12, 13 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> Ord ( T i^i dom F ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_ordtypelem4 | |- ( ph -> O : ( T i^i dom F ) --> A ) |
| 16 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( O : ( T i^i dom F ) --> A -> dom O = ( T i^i dom F ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom O = ( T i^i dom F ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_ordeq | |- ( dom O = ( T i^i dom F ) -> ( Ord dom O <-> Ord ( T i^i dom F ) ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( Ord dom O <-> Ord ( T i^i dom F ) ) ) |
| 20 | 14, 19 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> Ord dom O ) |
| 21 | 17 | #P_feq2d | |- ( ph -> ( O : dom O --> A <-> O : ( T i^i dom F ) --> A ) ) |
| 22 | 15, 21 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> O : dom O --> A ) |
| 23 | 20, 22 | #P_jca | |- ( ph -> ( Ord dom O /\ O : dom O --> A ) ) |
